measured_by: combined 7-point Likert acceptability and blame ratings on text-based moral scenarios
justification: “After reading each story, participants provided two types of moral judgments … they were averaged to form a single moral judgment per condition, indexing severity of moral condemnation.”

measured_by: animated shapes paradigm (Frith-Happé animations) ToM localizer task
justification: “In order to localize functional regions involved in mental state attribution, we used the animated shapes paradigm based on the Frith-Happé animations, a reliable and sensitive method for eliciting spontaneous mentalizing.”

measured_by: moral judgment ratings for accidental harm scenarios within the text-based moral judgment task
justification: The study relates “the degree to which participants relied on information about innocent intentions to forgive accidental harms” to the moral judgment scores obtained from the accidental harm scenarios using the same acceptability/blame rating procedure.
